title: Facile synthesis of substituted 2-aroylbenzo[b]thiophen-3-ols to form novel triazole hybrids using click chemistry
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,10270-10279
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01146E, Paper

Asma Mukhtar, Arif Hussain, Faiza Younas, Sammer Yousuf, Muhammad Saeed
In the presence of triethylamine, 2-mercaptobenzoic acid (6) reacts with aryl bromomethyl ketones (8) to produce benzothiophenes (5), which can be subjected to a click reaction to construct benzothiophene-triazole hybrids (14).
